Okpokwu bụ mpaghara gọọmentị nke Benue Steeti, Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Okpoga nke dị na ndịda mpaghara ahụ
Benue Steeti Polytechnic dị n'obodo Ugbokolo na LGA a.
O nwere mpaghara nke 731 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 176,647 na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006.
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 973.
Okpokwu bụ ebe obibi nke Benue Steeti Polytechnic na New Vision Institute of teknụzụ Ekenobi
LGAs and communities of Benue State
Gọọmentị ime obodo nwere ngalaba kansụl iri na abụọ ya bụ: Ameju, Eke, Ichama1, Ichama11, Ingle-Okpale, Ojigo, Okonobo, Okpoga Central, Okpog North, Okpoba South, Okpogu West na Ugbokolo.
